By authorizing the USGS’s Great Lakes Science Center for the first time, we are prioritizing the research on fish populations & invasive species used by the #GreatLakes states to support the health and growth of our $7B fishing industry.  https://bit.ly/2Q06EHG

The #GreatLakes are an invaluable resource to #Ohio, critically important to both our environment & our economy. My legislation to enable the US Geological Survey to continue to conduct fishery research was included in the final FY2020 funding bill.

Cyber threats are growing and Homeland Security cyber hunt and incident response teams play an important role in protecting against cyber threats, reducing cybersecurity risks, & helping to get our cyber infrastructure back up and running after an attack occurs.

It also includes $40M for the centrifuge demonstration project, which this administration supports and agrees is necessary for our national security. I will continue to work w/ my colleagues & the administration to ensure this site gets cleaned up and ready for redevelopment.

My #RECYCLEAct is common-sense, bipartisan legislation that expands recycling and will help educate our communities about their local recycling programs so we can increase recycling rates & reduce contamination.
I’m grateful that @POTUS signed into law my reauthorization of this common-sense legislation.  https://bit.ly/2PDMLWG

Since 1998, my bipartisan Tropical Forest Conservation Act has protected tens of millions of acres of tropical forest from deforestation and reduced CO2 emissions equivalent to taking 11.8 million cars off the road.

But we’ve still got work to do, everywhere I go in #Ohio, employers are looking for qualified workers. The bipartisan #JOBSAct will help more students gain the knowledge & training necessary to succeed in the #jobs available today.

Our economy was strong in 2019. More #jobs are being created and the number of #jobs available today now outnumbers the unemployed by record margins. Exciting that wages are rising and everyone is benefiting from the pay increases.

This is the largest investment for my #CARA grant program since it was enacted into law and I know that it will be vital in helping our communities in #Ohio and across our nation deliver positive results in combating addiction.

The final FY 2020 funding bill that @POTUS signed into law last week includes $658M for my bipartisan #CARA law, which provides resources for evidence-based prevention, treatment, and recovery programs to help people overcome their addiction.

This will give states the flexibility to use opioid grants to address the rising threat of meth & cocaine. https://www.cincinnati.com/story/news/2019/12/26/states-get-ok-shift-u-s-opioid-funding-meth-cocaine-problems/2686310001/ …

In ’97 I authored legislation called the Drug-Free Communities Act, which supports evidence-based & community driven drug prevention programs. We need them now more than ever, so I'm glad 3 programs in #Ohio just received new funding to combat the addiction crisis.

I have consistently said that I will do my duty and listen to all the facts as a juror in the Senate. Last week, the @DispatchAlerts ed board misrepresented my position. My response: https://www.dispatch.com/opinion/20191224/letter-editorial-wrong-about-my-position-on-impeachment …

The final FY 2020 funding bill that @POTUS signed into law last week includes my bipartisan legislation to help secure pension benefits for nearly 6000 #Ohioans whose hard-earned pensions would have reduced dramatically starting next year.  https://bit.ly/2sUGBsE

I’m proud my bipartisan #RURALAct is now law & will help preserve #jobs & encourage broadband internet development in rural parts of #Ohio and the US. This legislation is vital to help those living in rural areas compete in the increasingly digital economy  https://bit.ly/35FSroU

The #SECUREAct, now law, includes reforms I wrote to help Americans save more for retirement, help #smallbiz provide retirement plans for their workers, increase access to 401(k)s for part time workers, and allow those choosing to work later in life to keep saving for retirement.
One of the extensions I helped to secure is the New Market Tax Credit, which helps economically-distressed communities attract more investors in order to redevelop areas & bring in more #jobs.

I’m committed to continuing middle-class tax relief & generating more investment & economic development in #Ohio, which is why I fought to include tax extenders in the final funding bill.  https://bit.ly/2MoQJ3x

These wins support economic growth, #job creation, retirement security, #Ohio’s military installations, bolster efforts to protect our environment & #GreatLakes, combat the addiction epidemic, make health care more affordable & accessible & increase cybersecurity.
Last week, I helped secure more than 40 key legislation victories for #Ohio and the country in the final FY 2020 funding measure as well as #FY2020NDAA conference report.  https://bit.ly/2MoQJ3x
https://bit.ly/35FSroU

In today’s tech-dependent world, we must do more to bring high-speed internet & stronger grid infrastructure to the rural areas of the US. My #RURALAct, which is now law, will help expand broadband internet access in rural communities so they can compete on a level playing field.

Addiction is a disease that must be treated like other diseases. I’m proud that my Combating Meth & Cocaine Act is now law so state officials have more flexibility to address this issue. https://youtu.be/UmsdiFcU0WQ
https://bit.ly/2S99HPt

Good news for #Dayton. The National Aviation Heritage Area is home to our nation’s aviation history & supports #jobs & economic development.  Yesterday @POTUS signed into law my bipartisan bill w/ @SenSherrodBrown to help ensure it is preserved & enjoyed by future generations.

I cosponsored & strongly supported this legislation to give our miners the secure health care & pension benefits they've earned & peace of mind to their families. This is a victory for our miners & for #Ohio.

Our miners worked hard, played by the rules, and earned their health care & pension benefits, which would be reduced dramatically or lost altogether if not for our work to pass the Bipartisan American Miners Act, which @POTUS signed into law on Friday.  https://bit.ly/2SbNjVw
I will continue working for a long-term extension to help ensure that the most vulnerable among us have better access to quality care.  https://bit.ly/35H0hyt

The Money Follows the Person program is an important initiative that supports more than 10,000 #Ohioans receive the home & community-based care they need. Pleased we extended this program for five months through the final FY2020 funding bill.

I will continue to work w/ my colleagues in the #Senate to make sure those on the frontlines – our community leaders, first responders, & family members – have the support & funding they need to continue their work to fight this addiction epidemic.

The FY 2020 funding bill includes $658M for anti-drug grants through my bipartisan #CARA law. I’ve seen firsthand how #Ohio programs make great use of CARA funding to combat addiction & making a real difference in our communities. https://bit.ly/2Q2wgCF

As people in #Ohio and around the world prepare to celebrate the Festival of Lights, Jane and I want to wish our friends in the Jewish community peace & joy during this blessed holiday. Hanukkah Sameach #HappyHanukkah!
Also proud that the Senate unanimously passed my bipartisan Protecting Faith-Based and Nonprofit Organizations From Terrorism Act last week to ensure this program is authorized for the next 5 yrs.

The final FY 2020 funding bill includes $90M I fought for so that synagogues, religious & cultural facilities, & other nonprofits across the US that are at a high risk of a terrorist attack have access to the funding & best practices they need to secure their facilities.

As we’ve seen recently, the threats to houses of worship & other religious community sites are increasing and we must do everything we can to protect them in #Ohio & across the US.  https://bit.ly/2MetDfQ

There is still more that we can do to help more Americans save for their retirement. I believe that passage of the #SECUREAct can help pave the way for bolder reforms in legislation I have introduced w/ @SenatorCardin called the Retirement Security and Savings Act.

I fought to pass the #SECUREAct and I’m pleased @RealDonaldTrump signed it into law yesterday. It will strengthen Americans’ retirement security & help ensure they have a chance to build a solid nest egg for their retirement.  https://bit.ly/2ECGuUW

Other tax incentives that are critical to continuing middle-class tax relief & generating more investment & economic dev. in #Ohio were also included in the final funding bill like #WOTC, the #NMTC, CFC Look-through, the Medical Expense Deduction & the Craft Beverage Tax Relief.

Hardworking #Ohioans rely on the Health Coverage Tax Credit for affordable health insurance after they were adversely affected by foreign trade. I'm grateful that the HCTC was extended an extra year, providing stability to thousands of #Ohioans in the final funding bill.

I’m grateful for the backing we’ve received from the Trump administration and my bipartisan colleagues for #GLRI & I will continue to help lead efforts in the #Senate as co-chair of the Great Lakes Task Force, to support this critical bipartisan initiative  https://bit.ly/2sJQDwB
The final funding bill includes a record $320M for #GLRI to address the threats to the ecological and economic wellbeing of the lakes.
The #GreatLakes are critical to #Ohio’s fishing industry, provide drinking water for 40M people, contribute billions in tourism & support thousands of #jobs across the region.

Tonight on the @SenateFloor, I highlighted the overwhelming bipartisan House passage of #USMCA. This is a victory for American farmers, workers, manufacturers and all Americans. I urge my Senate colleagues to join me in supporting USMCA when it comes to a vote early next year.

As I’ve said many times, there is no place for hatred or bigotry of any kind in the US. The threats & senseless attacks we’ve seen across our country are attacks on our values & this bipartisan bill will help protect faith & cultural based institutions in #Ohio and across the US.

Tonight the Senate passed my bipartisan legislation authorizing $75M annually for the @DHSgov Nonprofit Security Grant Program, which provides grants to nonprofits & faith-based organizations to help secure their facilities against a potential terrorist attack.

A vote for #USMCA is a vote for improved market access, more US manufacturing #jobs & a more level playing field for American workers, farmers, and service providers. I urge my colleagues in the #Senate to join me in supporting it.

#Ohio’s 2 top trading partners are Canada & Mexico. #USMCA is particularly good for Ohio b/c it expands market access for farm products, incentivizes more auto production in the state, & makes online sales easier for Ohio companies. #jobs

By opening more markets, #USMCA is good for US workers, farmers, and manufacturers, and it will create thousands of new #jobs in the US. I applaud @realDonaldTrump & @USTradeRep Lighthizer for their persistence & their determination to finalize this historic new trade agreement.

Today’s strong bipartisan vote for #USMCA is good news for #Ohio & our country & it paves the way for Senate approval early next year. This long-awaited agreement is a significant improvement over the status quo of NAFTA. #jobs  https://bit.ly/36T0z5z

These tax incentives are critical to continuing middle-class tax relief & generating more investment & economic development in #Ohio & I want to thank @realDonaldTrump for his support.  https://bit.ly/2tviH73
Today the Senate passed an extension of key tax incentives which I’ve seen help boost #Ohio’s economy, economic development, #jobs & innovation.

Grateful that the Senate has just confirmed Judge Matt McFarland to serve on the US Federal District Court for the Southern District of #Ohio. His esteemed reputation is well deserved & I’m confident he will continue to make Ohio proud.  https://bit.ly/38RTFiY

I also highlighted the economic benefits of #USMCA, which will create #jobs & support American workers, farmers, & manufacturers. I’m pleased that House Democrats finally agreed to bring #USMCA up for a vote & I’m confident the Senate will pass it in a bipartisan fashion as well.

Finally, the #FY2020NDAA also expands existing financial protections for Gold Star military families’ residential and car leases & posthumously promotes Lt Col Richard Cole to Colonel, the last of the living Doolittle Raiders until he passed away earlier this year.
This legislation also improves coordination across the federal government in identifying and responding to emerging contaminants like per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) in our drinking water.

#FY2020NDAA imposes mandatory sanctions on foreign banks & companies that facilitate illicit financial transactions for #NorthKorea, holding them accountable for their actions & human rights abuses against Otto Warmbier as well as others they’ve illegally held captive.

The NDAA also directs the @DeptofDefense to brief Congress on how they are developing and prioritizing explainable artificial intelligence & to provide Congress with a comparative analysis and briefing on U.S. and #Chinese AI capabilities.

And #FY2020NDAA authorizes $300M in security assistance for #Ukraine’s forces, sending a clear message that the US stands w/ the Ukrainian people in their struggle to secure a democratic, prosperous, and independent future in the face of Russian aggression.
#FY2020NDAA authorizes $120.9M in funding to finish construction at #NASIC located at the @WrightPattAFB.
#FY2020NDAA authorizes $394 million for upgrading Stryker Vehicles at the JSMC in Lima, #Ohio & $523 million for purchasing 152 Stryker A1 Vehicles to be built.

#FY2020NDAA authorizes $1.7 billion in funding to upgrade 165 Abrams tanks, increasing the rate of production of the upgraded Abrams tanks Joint Systems Manufacturing Center (JSMC) in Lima in order to ensure that our forward deployed tanks have the most cutting-edge capabilities.

The #FY2020NDAA includes a number of initiatives I’ve fought for to support #Ohio’s military installations, increase troop pay, support our veterans & their spouses, enhance our cybersecurity & provide additional assistance to #Ukraine:
https://bit.ly/38NBo67

Tax-exempt rural co-ops provide broadband services to parts of the country where access to reliable electricity & high-speed internet is most limited. My bipartisan #RURALAct will help provide the certainty these co-ops are looking for to bring these services to rural #Ohio.

In order to ensure #Ohioans benefit from broader economic growth we must do more to provide access to reliable broadband internet. I’m proud my bipartisan #RURALAct is included in the final funding bill, which helps to promote economic development & #job creation in rural #Ohio

It also includes 2 provisions I’ve championed to help expand access to 401(k)s & allow individuals choosing to work later in life to keep saving for retirement. I look forward to the president signing this bill into law quickly to strengthen the retirement security of Americans.

The #SECUREAct includes legislation I’ve introduced to help protect the retirement security of hundreds of thousands of dedicated older Americans who are at risk of losing future retirement benefits at the end of this year.

The #SECUREAct being included in the FY 2020 funding bill is a big victory that will help ensure that all hard-working Americans, esp. #smallbiz workers, have a chance to build a nest egg for their retirement.   https://bit.ly/2qZycU7
I'll continue to work with my colleagues & the administration next year to help bring all sides together on a long-term agreement on these tax extenders and other fixes to the tax reform law.
Too often, Congress refuses to make the hard choices with these temporary tax provisions, resulting in short-term, ineffective policy that we constantly have to revisit.  https://bit.ly/2PSCYeo

Although I believe it was necessary to pass this tax extensions package to avoid economic dislocation, Congress must have a serious discussion next year on the future of these provisions, making permanent the ones that work & ending or phasing out the ones that are unnecessary.
I fought to preserve a number of these tax incentives in the #taxreform law because they drive more economic growth and #job creation, and that’s good for our country and for #Ohio. #jobs

I want to thank @realDonaldTrump for his support for extending many key tax incentives that are critical to continuing middle-class tax relief and generating more investment and economic development in #Ohio.  https://bit.ly/2PSCYeo

The Ticket to Work arbitrary age limit forces working disabled seniors to make an impossible choice b/w maintaining their independence & livelihood or their Medicaid coverage. This is unacceptable & my bipartisan #SENIORCARE Act will remove this unnecessary & obsolete barrier.
